title: How to View Your Old Instagram Stories

steps.title: Open Instagram.
steps.content: Open Instagram. This app icon looks like a camera lens on an orange to purple gradient that you'll find on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching. The archiving feature is enabled by default. If your Stories are not archiving, you can turn on this feature by going to your profile and tapping ☰ > Your activity > Archived > ⋮ (Android) or ••• (iOS) > Settings > Save story to archive. [1] X Research source While you can toggle the Archive feature on and off from your web browser, you can't see or unarchive old Stories that way. So, you'll need to use the mobile app for Android, iPhone, or iPad instead.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. It's in the row of icons at the bottom of your screen and will redirect you to your profile. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . You'll see this icon in the top right corner of your screen. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Archive.
steps.content: Tap Archive . It's next to a clock icon. Your Stories archive will display. If you don't see Archive here, tap Your activity > Archived .

steps.title: Tap a Story to view it.
steps.content: Tap a Story to view it. It will start playing again. Some elements will be changed to allow for storage space. For example, if your Story has a Music sticker, that music will be muted. Sharing this Story will not share the change that was made.

steps.title: Return to your Archive.
steps.content: Return to your Archive. If you want to share an archived story with your followers again, you can unarchive the story. To get started, go to your profile and tap ☰ > Archive .

steps.title: Tap the Story you want to share with your followers again.
steps.content: Tap the Story you want to share with your followers again. It will begin playing in a new window.

steps.title: Tap Share.
steps.content: Tap Share . It's at the bottom of your screen next to "Highlight" and the "More" menu.

steps.title: Tap Your story.
steps.content: Tap Your story . This will publish your old Story for your followers to see again.

steps.title: How can I see old stories after 24 hours if they aren't archived?
steps.content: How can I see old stories after 24 hours if they aren't archived? You can only recover deleted Stories for up to 24 hours that aren't in your Stories Archive. To do this, go to your profile, and tap ☰ > Your activity > Recently deleted > The Story > ••• > Restore to Profile/Restore . [4] X Research source

steps.title: Can I see old Instagram stories from other people?
steps.content: Can I see old Instagram stories from other people? You can only see old Stories for other accounts if they have it highlighted on their profile page.

steps.title: Why is my Archive empty?
steps.content: Why is my Archive empty? If you go to your archive and don't see anything, make sure you have the feature enabled. Go to your profile, and tap * ☰ > Your activity > Archived >*** ⋮ (Android) or ••• (iOS) > Settings > Save story to archive .
